content.question: Scientists have been monitoring <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the atmosphere from Mauna Loa in Hawaii since 1958. Which of the following units is used by scientists to measure <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the atmosphere?

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Describe an aspect of a research method, design, and/or measure used.
